items.title: Market Today: Ratan Tata dies, TCS Q2, GIFT Nifty up 100 pts, Israel war
items.description: At 6:30 AM, GIFT Nifty Futures were up 123 points at 25,207, indicating a gap-up opening for the Indian bourses.

items.title: Should you sell Nifty Auto, IT on rise? Here' what analysts recommend
items.description: The Nifty IT Index is currently trading close to its key resistance level, making it a prime candidate for a "sell on rise" strategy for near-term traders. The resistance level to watch is 43,200

items.title: Buy & Sell, Oct 10; top stock picks by Ajit Mishra of Religare Broking
items.description: Havells witnessed a sharp rally after a breakout from multi-month consolidation phase. However, in line with market corrective phase, the stock retraced towards the neckline of its previous breakout

items.title: Stocks to Watch: Tata stocks, AEL, Vedanta, JSW Infra, ICICI Sec, Jio Fin

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty signals higher open for India markets; Tata group stocks eyed
items.description: Stock Market Today: GIFT Nifty futures, trading around 100 points ahead, signalled a higher open for the Indian markets on Thursday.

items.title: Dividend, stock-split: Coforge, Softsol, 4 others under spotlight today

items.title: GR Infraprojects shares soar 6% on bagging 'LoA' for Nagpur Metro Project
items.description: Shares of GR Infraprojects surged up to 5.81 per cent at Rs 1,730 per share on the BSE in Thursday's early morning trade

items.title: PNC Infratech emerges lowest bidder for project of Rs 2091-cr; shares up 7%
items.description: The PNC Infratech share soared after the company announced that it has been declared at the lowest bidder for a project of Rs 2,090.59 crore from CIDCO

items.title: Nifty weekly expiry in focus; FIIs pile up bearish bets in Bank Nifty
items.description: Derivatives market update Oct 10: FIIs open positions in Bank Nifty up over 200% since the start of Oct; overall long-short ratio in index futures now at lowest level since June.

items.title: Garuda Construction IPO ends today: GMP falls flat; should you bid?
items.description: The three-day subscription window to bid for the Garuda Construction IPO, which has been oversubscribed 4.10 times, concludes today

items.title: Ratan Tata death: Tata Group stocks trade mixed; TaMo down 2%, TCS up 1%
items.description: Ratan Tata News: Tata Chemicals, Indian Hotels Company, Tejas Networks, Voltas, Tata Elxsi and Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) were up in the range of 1 per cent to 4 per cent

items.title: RCF share price rallies 8% on awarding Rs 1,000-crore order to L&T; details
items.description: The RCF share price surged after the company announced that it has awarded an order of a little over Rs 1,000 crore to L&T Energy Hydrocarbon division of L&T.

items.title: It has been stock picker's market since quite some time now: Rajesh Bhatia
items.description: Our emphasis is on careful stock selection within sectors, rather than making significant overweight or underweight sector bets, Bhatia said

items.title: ICICI Securities slides over 3% as NCLT approves delisting plans; details
items.description: ICICI Securities share price dipped as much as 3.42 per cent to Rs 837.65 per share on the BSE in Thursday's early morning trade

items.title: Oil India up 3% on Motilal Oswal's 'buy' rating with target price of Rs 720
items.description: Amid weak crude oil prices, the share price of Oil India has declined 23 per cent from its record high level of Rs 767.30 touched on August 30.

items.title: Adani Enterprises declines 3% after launching Rs 16,000-crore QIP issue
items.description: The company's board had approved a total fundraising of Rs 16,600 crore by the way of QIP or other modes in one or more tranches, on May 23, 2024.

items.title: Here's why Ola Electric share was down over 3% on October 10; reasons here
items.description: Ola Electric's share price declined following a request from the Ministry of Heavy Industries (MHI) to the ARAI for its assessment of the increasing number of consumer complaints against the company.

items.title: VA Tech gains 7% on securing large repeat orders from Reliance Industries
items.description: VA Tech Wabag share price: The large orders from RIL ranges between Rs 300 crore to Rs 500 crore

items.title: DLF surges 3% on reports of launching India's costliest project in Gurugram
items.description: Share price of real estate giant DLF surged up to 878.20 a piece on Thursday, rising 3.03 per cent intraday amid reports of launching a super luxury residential project in Gurugram

items.title: GTPL Hathway share price drops 4% after Q2 profit plunges 63% YoY
items.description: The fall in GTPL Hathway share price came after the company reported a weak set of September quarter (Q2FY25) results.

items.title: Rain Ind up 9% as unit to make battery anode material with Canadian partner
items.description: Rain Carbon and Northern Graphite Corporation will develop advanced battery anode material (BAM) used in lithium-Ion batteries for EVs.

items.title: 5 lesser-known Tata Group shares have surged up to 90% in 2024; what next?
items.description: TRF, Automotive Stampings, Orient Hotels and NELCO can surged up to 24% from present levels, suggest technical charts. The trend, however, looks weak for Tejas Networks.

items.title: Ashoka Buildcon up 5% as JV emerges lowest bidder for order of Rs 1,668 cr
items.description: The rise in the share price came after the company announced that its joint venture (JV) has emerged as the lowest bidder for a project of Rs 1,667.78 crore from CIDCO

items.title: Hyundai Motor India's mega IPO: Will this be a Diwali bonanza for Seoul?
items.description: Despite contributing only 6.5 per cent of global revenues and 8 per cent of profitability, Hyundai's India unit will be valued at 42 per cent of the parent company's market capitalisation upon listing

items.title: This smallcap stock flew 30% in two days, zoomed 228% in one year; details
items.description: Shares of smallcap firm Ceinsys Tech rallied up to 9.23 per cent on Monday, reaching their all time high at Rs 944 per share

items.title: What's driven a 200% rally in this power tech co in 2024 so far? Details
items.description: In the past three trading days, the stock price of Hitachi Energy India has surged 15% after the company announced its plans to invest around Rs 2,000 crore over the next four to five years.

items.title: Defence stocks soar up to 7% after govt okays building 2 nuclear submarines
items.description: The Indian Navy will get two nuclear-powered attack submarines, which will boost its underwater deterrence capabilities manifold in the Indian Ocean Region.

items.title: RBI's caution against inflation may halt rally in FMCG stocks: Analysts
items.description: FMCG companies: RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das pointed out that core inflation, which excludes food and fuel prices, was on an uptrend in July and August

items.title: IIFL Finance shares jump 4% after board approves NCD issue worth Rs 150 cr
items.description: IIFL Finance share price today jumped up to 4.24 per cent at Rs 473 per share on the BSE in Thursday's intraday trade

items.title: GM Breweries down 6% after reporting weak Q2FY25 results; profit slips 3%
items.description: GM Breweries share price: Its revenue from operations stood at Rs 595.78 crore as against Rs 594.47, marginally up 0.22 per cent

items.title: CreditAccess Grameen share price hit 52-wk low on weak Q2 disbursements
items.description: The fall in CreditAccess Grameen share price came after the company's disbursements dropped 19% annually to Rs 4,004 cr in Q2FY25, from Rs 4,966 crore in Q2FY24.

items.description: Ahead of the opening of the much-awaited Hyundai Motor India IPO, Samir Arora of Helios Capital has shared his outlook on the auto industry. Here's what the market expert thinks

items.title: Gujarat Fluoro rallies 7%, hits new high on hopes of strong FY25 earnings
items.description: The stock price of Gujarat Fluorochemicals has zoomed 52% in five weeks, taking the market capitalisation of the company beyond Rs 50,000 crore for the first time

items.description: Natural Wellness is incorporated as a wholly owned subsidiary of Spectrum Delight

items.title: Maharatna stock: Power Grid Corporation bags new project; shares up 3%

items.title: Hercules Hoists soars 12% ahead of demerger record date; up 103% in 2024
items.description: Each equity shareholder of Hercules Hoists, as on the record date i.e. Friday, October 11, will be issued and allotted 1 share of Indef Manufacturing for one fully-paid up share of Hercules Hoists
